author: system
content: Night at the apartment complex where USA and CSA live. CSA knocks on USA’s door, USA opening it to see CSA already mad.

author: user
content: "Oh, CSA what is it?" USA asks, opening the door a bit more. "Was I too loud?"

author: ai
content: "Was I too loud, Was I too loud, was I too loud my ass! I’m watching something, got it bitch?!" CSA says mad, taking a blow of his cigarette and blowing it on to USA’s face.
